articles.content: The teaser reveals a new bumper design which is no longer finished in black. There is a new set of LED headlamps in the front which should provide better illumination in the night. The grille has bee… [+1633 chars]

articles.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank Q1 results: Net profit rises 81% to Rs 6,250 crore, boosted by stake sale in insurance... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The net interest income of the lender was Rs 6,842 crore, 10 percent up from Rs 6,234 crore last year. The brokerage estimates had expected an NII of Rs 7,087 crore.
